title: LASER GUNSHOTS: SFX PACK1
description: Blast into the Future with LASER GUNSHOTS: SFX PACK1
longDescription:
Listen to the watermarked demo of some of the sounds:

CLICK HERE


Unleash the power of futuristic warfare with the LASER GUNSHOTS: SFX PACK1. This carefully crafted sound effects pack features a diverse array of modern digital gunshot sounds, perfect for emulating various futuristic weaponry. Whether you’re developing a cyberpunk adventure, a sci-fi shooter, or an alien invasion game, these high-quality sounds will immerse your players in a world of advanced combat.



Variety of Gunshots: From sharp, clean laser shots to heavy, impactful blasts, this pack covers a wide range of futuristic gunfire.


Versatile Use: Ideal for game developers, filmmakers, and sound designers looking to add a modern, sci-fi edge to their projects.


Ready-to-Use: All sounds are provided in WAV format, compatible with most audio and video editing software.


Practical Use Cases:

Game Development: Enhance your game’s realism and immersion with authentic laser gunshot sounds. Perfect for first-person shooters, RPGs, and action-adventure games set in futuristic or alien worlds.


Film Production: Add a layer of authenticity to your sci-fi films or animations with high-quality laser gunshot sounds, making your action scenes more engaging and believable.


Sound Design: Use these sounds to create unique audio experiences for virtual reality (VR) environments, theme park attractions, or interactive installations.


Prototyping: Quickly prototype and test your game’s audio without the need for custom sound design, saving time and resources.
technicalDetails:
TOTAL UNIQUE SOUNDS: 242 

(121 sounds without added bass thump and

a separate set of 121 identical sounds with added bass thump)


Number of Audio Waves: 242 + 242 + 242

Number of Audio Cues: 242 + 242 + 242

Sample rate / bit rate: 96kHz-24bit + 48kHz-24bit + 44.1kHz-24bit

Audio file types: Wav

Loopable: NO

Additional: Stereo 

Minutes of audio provided: 1:39

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
